title: Rodgers and Guthrie Statement on Two Health Bills Signed into Law
description: Washington, D.C.— House Energy and Commerce Committee Republican Leader Cathy McMorris Rodgers (R-WA) and Health Subcommittee Republican Leader Brett Guthrie (R-KY) released the following statement after President Joe Biden signed H.R. 1667, Dr. Lorna Breen Health Care Provider Protection Act, and H.R. 189, the John Lewis NIMHD Research Endowment Revitalization Act of 2021.

title: Guthrie Opening Remarks on Unleashing Innovation for Lifesaving Cures and Treatments
description: Washington, D.C. — Health Subcommittee Republican Leader Brett Guthrie (R-KY) delivered remarks at today’s legislative hearing on the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) user fees and bipartisan work to unleash medical innovation.

title: Leader Rodgers: “Today’s proposals will improve medical oversight, innovation, and advance critical therapies and cures for rare diseases.”
description: Washington, D.C. — House Energy and Commerce Committee Republican Leader Cathy McMorris Rodgers (R-WA) delivered remarks at today’s Health Subcommittee legislative hearing on the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) user fees and bipartisan work to unleash medical innovation.

title: Communications and Technology Subcommittee Leader Latta’s Opening Remarks on Managing our Spectrum Smartly
description: Washington, D.C. — Communications and Technology Subcommittee Republican Leader Bob Latta (R-OH) delivered opening remarks at today’s subcommittee hearing on spectrum management.

title: Leader Rodgers: “To win the future, we must continue to make spectrum available, promote innovation, and keep up with wireless demands”
description: Washington, D.C. — House Energy and Commerce Committee Republican Leader Cathy McMorris Rodgers (R-WA) delivered opening remarks at today’s Communications and Technology Subcommittee on ensuring American leadership in next generation communications technology.

title: Leader Rodgers Statement Following President Zelenskyy’s Address to Congress
description: Washington, D.C. — House Energy and Commerce Committee Republican Leader Cathy McMorris Rodgers (R-WA) released the following statement after Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy addressed members of Congress today.

title: The Future of Medicine: Legislation to Encourage Innovation and Improve Oversight
5G and Beyond: Exploring the Next Wireless Frontier
